channel.title: How can i make my self lvl under 138? like 250 or sumthing like that.. ( help )
channel.description: someone know if is possible to do that? im using insidiaX ( base ) and vernix-pkz ( source )

item.title: How can i make my self lvl under 138? like 250 or sumthing like that.. ( help )
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

so calm down a little bit. im not a fucking nerd .[/quote]
Il ya le code qui est envoyé au client pour lui indiquer ce niveau de combat de représenter. Vous pouvez créer une autre variable si vous voulez et mettez ce que vous voulez …

item.title: How can i make my self lvl under 138? like 250 or sumthing like that.. ( help )
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

In player.java

playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);

There’s the code that’s sent to the client to tell it what combat level to represent. You could create another variable if you want and set it to whatever you want…

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make my self lvl under 138? like 250 or sumthing like that.. ( help )
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("cmb")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); c.newCombat = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); c.newCmb = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); } catch (Exception e) { } }

Took 5 minutes of searching on google for that…
